name: aai-programmable-vehicles
title: AAI-可编程载具
author: Earendel
description: 利用遥控器、电路或AAI区域编程和控制自动化载具。用于应付基地袭击，巡逻及基于采矿车的采矿等等。适用于原版及MOD的载具
description_original: Program and control autonomous vehicles using a remote control handset, or circuit conditions and zones. Can be used for base enemy base assault, patrols, friendly base navigation, vehicle-based mining, and more advanced applications. Works with vanilla and modded vehicles.
